name: Solar Crest
lore: A talisman forged to honor the daytime sky.

descriptions.name: Shine
descriptions.description: When cast on an ally, grants them 10 armor and 20% evasion. When cast on an enemy, removes 10 of their armor and grants your allies 35% Accuracy on the target. Removes the armor and evasion from the caster when used.  Cannot target magic immune enemies.Range: 1000
